panels.content:
The cluster status might present different values:
- green: all shards are allocated (can be written/read to/from).
- yellow: some shards are missing its replicas
- red: some shards are totally missing (no primary, no replica(s)). This also means that some parts of the index will not take write/reads.

If you need to take a look at host-level metrics (CPU, Memory, IOPS, etc) please use the dashboard link on the top-right corner!
panels.title: Information
